LanguageData.GR_DinoGenomeExcavator.label: dino genome excavator
LanguageData.GR_DinoGenomeExcavator.description:
A simplified genome extraction device designed to be usable by even the most simple-minded goon, as such it resembles a caulking gun that works in reverse. The best genetic material can be found in the brain and the automated, single-use design instantly compresses this material into a usable genome.

The desired subject needs to be docile and trusting of the user who intends on scooping out their brain in a process that is not-quite instantaneous. It is recommended to anesthetize the creature as any sudden movement on their part will interrupt the whole process. Alternatively, it will also work on a dead body...

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> This excavator can be used to acquire the following genomes:
